name: Luffa
description: All parts of the Luffa plant possess the medicinal properties. Luffa Fruit (Towel Gourd) is used in cooking as well as to treat various health ailments. It is helpful to lower the blood sugar, constipation, weight loss, and hypoglycemia, enhance immune system, weight loss and detoxifies the body.
